entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 9:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
